title: Brigitte Bardot, 91, says a ‘miracle’ saved her from multiple suicide attempts
description: The former sex symbol has struggled with depression for many years.
content:
Brigitte Bardot thinks it’s a “miracle” that she didn’t die after several suicide attempts.
The former sex symbol, 91, opens up about her mental health in a newly released documentary called “Bardot… [+2715 chars]
